commands.name: vercel deploy
commands.description: Deploy your project to Vercel. Default command when no subcommand is specified.

commands.name: vercel dev
commands.description: Start a local development server that replicates the Vercel deployment environment.

commands.name: vercel env pull
commands.description: Download environment variables from Vercel to a local .env file.

commands.name: vercel env add
commands.description: Add a new environment variable to your Vercel project.

commands.name: vercel link
commands.description: Link a local directory to an existing Vercel project.

commands.name: vercel build
commands.description: Build your project locally using the same process Vercel uses.

commands.name: vercel logs
commands.description: View runtime logs for a specific deployment in real-time.

commands.name: vercel domains
commands.description: Manage custom domains for your Vercel projects.

commands.name: vercel rollback
commands.description: Roll back your production deployment to a previous version.

commands.name: vercel redeploy
commands.description: Rebuild and redeploy an existing deployment without code changes.

commands.name: vercel inspect
commands.description: Get detailed information about a deployment including build logs.

commands.name: vercel alias
commands.description: Assign a custom domain alias to a deployment.

commands.name: vercel whoami
commands.description: Display the currently logged in Vercel user.

commands.name: vercel login
commands.description: Authenticate with your Vercel account.

commands.name: vercel switch
commands.description: Switch between different Vercel teams/scopes.

commands.name: generateText
commands.description: Generate a complete text response from an AI model. Returns the full response at once.
commands.usage: const { text } = await generateText({ model, prompt })

commands.name: streamText
commands.description: Stream text responses token-by-token for real-time display.
commands.usage: const result = await streamText({ model, prompt })

commands.name: generateObject
commands.description: Generate structured JSON data that conforms to a Zod schema.
commands.usage: const { object } = await generateObject({ model, schema, prompt })

commands.name: useChat
commands.description: React hook for building chat interfaces with streaming responses.

commands.name: useCompletion
commands.description: React hook for text completion interfaces.

commands.name: npx @better-auth/cli init
commands.description: Initialize BetterAuth in your project with interactive setup wizard.

commands.name: npx @better-auth/cli generate
commands.description: Generate database schema for your BetterAuth configuration.

commands.name: npx @better-auth/cli migrate
commands.description: Apply database migrations (Kysely adapter only).

commands.name: npx clerk@latest
commands.description: Install Clerk authentication with automatic configuration.

commands.name: npm create sanity@latest
commands.description: Create a new Sanity Studio project with interactive setup.
